Name: Rose-Hyp Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of rose petal, edible flower or orange zest twist.
Review: Dry (but far from bone dry), aromatic and floral.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Rose-Hyp Martini contains 224 calories
